question: Which among the following statements is correct about Asthenosphere?
option1: It is a strong lower part of the mantle
option2: It is a weak, plastic layer of the upper mantle
option3: It is the uppermost rigid part of the mantle
option4: It is the liquid layer of the earth's core
answer: It is a weak, plastic layer of the upper mantle
explanation: Asthenosphere is the weak, plastic layer of the upper mantle on which the tectonic plates move.
